Traits.Name: Overdrive 4
Traits.Description: Attacks are all critical hits on hit at round 4 or later.

Actions.Name: Magnetism
Actions.Effect: All characters in range 2 of the foe are shoved 1 towards or away from that character (Disruptor chooses).

Actions.Name: Disrupt
Actions.Description: A character in range 8 is marked. While marked, they take 2 piercing damage for every adjacent character every time they end their turn.
